sqlMap.insert:
SELECT (NVL(MAX(SN), 0)+1) sn from MEDIA
INSERT INTO MEDIA ( SN , UUID , FILE_SN , MD_CODE , MD_SJ , USEYN , REVIV_CO) VALUES ( #sn# , #uuid# , #fileSn# , #mdCode# , #mdSj# , #useyn# , #revivCo#)

SELECT (NVL(MAX(FILE_SN), 0)+1) fileSn from FILE_DETAIL_INFO
INSERT INTO FILE_DETAIL_INFO ( FILE_SN , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #fileSn# , #fileStreCours# , #streFileNm# , #orignlFileNm# , #fileExtsn# , #fileCn# , #fileSize#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEDIA SET REVIV_CO = REVIV_CO + 1 WHERE SN = #sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.SN, A.MD_SJ, A.REVIV_CO, B.STRE_FILE_NM FROM MEDIA A JOIN FILE_DETAIL_INFO B ON A.FILE_SN = B.FILE_SN WHERE SN = #sn#
SELECT SN, MD_SJ, REVIV_CO FROM MEDIA WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND MD_CODE IN ('MLT02', 'MLT03') ORDER BY SN DESC
SELECT A.MD_CODE, B.FILE_SN, B.FILE_STRE_COURS, B.STRE_FILE_NM, B.FILE_EXTSN FROM MEDIA A JOIN FILE_DETAIL_INFO B ON A.FILE_SN = B.FILE_SN WHERE A.SN = #sn#
